name: Gem Splitting
description: Changes gem upgrade recipes to 2 gems. A single gem will split into two lower gems.
author: CelticHound

config.name: 2-Gem Upgrades
config.description: Modifies the gem upgrade recipes to require two of the lower gem.

config.name: Gem Splitting
config.description: Adds recipes for a single gem to split into two lower gems (28 new recipes).

config.name: Require a thawing potion to split
config.description: The recipes to split a single gem also require a thawing potion, for compatibility with StackableGems.

config.name: Gem Conversion
config.description: Adds recipes for a single gem plus a stamina potion to convert to a different gem of the same rank (35 new recipes).
